course_title: Pediatric Primary Care Nurse Practitioner II
class_notes: Online asynchronous and synchronous sessions. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: Students will expand clinical diagnostic, reasoning, and management skills to treat commonly diagnosed acute and chronic health conditions of infants, children and adolescents in pediatric primary care and specialty settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 619D prerequisite and NRSG 620D co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll in NRSG 620D first.
sections: Class Nbr: 1599, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. Buchanan, Status: Open
